import React from "react"; const style = { color: "black", fontFamily: "Trattatello", }; const tableStyle = { padding: "1px", borderCollapse: "collapse", borderSpacing: "0", width: "50%", }; const hourlyTable = { border: "1px solid black", fontSize: "12px", borderCollapse: "collapse", borderSpacing: "0", width: "50%", }; const row = { marginLeft:"-5px", marginRight:"-5px", } const column = { float: "left", display: "flex", width: "50%", padding: "5px", } export const Forecast = ({forecast}) => { let arr = forecast.forecast.forecastday[0].hour arr = [arr[0], arr[3], arr[6], arr[9], arr[12], arr[15], arr[18], arr[21]] return (

Today's weather in {forecast.location.name}, {forecast.location.region}

{forecast.current.condition.text}

Sunrise: {forecast.forecast.forecastday[0].astro.sunrise}Sunset: {forecast.forecast.forecastday[0].astro.sunset}Moonrise: {forecast.forecast.forecastday[0].astro.moonrise}Moonset: {forecast.forecast.forecastday[0].astro.moonset}
{arr.map(hour => ( ))}
Time Weather Temperature(Feels Like) Humidity Wind Speed (MPH)
{hour.time} {hour.temp_f}({hour.feelslike_f}) F {hour.humidity}% {hour.wind_mph}
) };
